file_content.text: Did you see that thing the snipers picked off this morning? Republic scout, I think.
Can't be worse than those jowly mouthflap fighter pilots. Sullustans or something.
It's worse. Eyes for ears, mouth in its forehead, some kind of tentacle...beard.
Patrol was rushed by a herd of Wookiees the other day. Don't they need trees?
They belong in them, anyway. Where does the Republic find these...things?
